commentList.translatedContent: Stayed here for 7 days. It's very quiet and clean. The cleaning ladies always smile and say hello to us every time we meet. It's a very comfortable interpersonal relationship! Breakfast is also very good, clean, hygienic and delicious. The environment is also very good. I would like to praise a few friends at the front desk, a taller and fatter boy, a shorter boy with glasses, and a girl about the same height as her, Xiao Yuan Tongxiao! On the first day we came here, we asked a lot of small questions because of room changes and breakfast issues. These guys were very patient, very detailed, and explained over and over again. Later, because of invoice issues and luggage storage, we had to upgrade the room type. I have communicated with them several times about the problem, and every time they are warm, polite, thoughtful, meticulous and courteous, which makes several of our colleagues admire us! Professional quality and professional skills go hand in hand! I heard that they are all born around 2000, and I admire them very much! Learn from you! I hope the store manager will praise them, they are really good! There is also a girl who has few interactions but is also very polite and serious! In short, I am not asking for help. Because of these friends, I will definitely come here next time I go on a business trip! Come on! You guys have a bright future!

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you very much for your review. Your satisfaction is the driving force for Xiaoji's progress. Xiaoji will continue to focus on guest needs and provide sincere services to demonstrate the high-quality services of Ji Hotel.

commentList.translatedContent: The environment is good, the aunt cleans it every day, the front desk service is very good, and there is a small robot to deliver food. The hotel is also in a good location, very close to the subway entrance, and it is very convenient to travel.

feedbackList.translateContent: Thank you for your review despite your busy schedule. We will continue to work hard to provide better service and look forward to your next stay.

commentList.translatedContent: Very cozy room! I really like this layout. The oversized TV is facing the side of the bed and there is a large window that can be opened. When I wake up during the day, I really feel the warm sunshine. What is particularly convenient is that this hotel can help collect express delivery ğŸ¥¹ I was very touched, I bought a lot ğŸ˜‚ I was not there when the express delivery came, but the hotel staff helped me deliver it to my room!

feedbackList.translateContent: Thank you for your review, Xiao Ji will work harder and look forward to your visit again!

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is very hygienic and the environment is very good. The aunt cleans it every day. I have stayed there many times. The attitude of the front desk is also very good. Any problems can be solved in time. The location of the hotel is also very good. It is very close to the Li subway entrance. There is also a small robot to deliver food.

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest: Thank you very much for your affirmation of the store's service. The store is only 450 meters away from Suzhouqiao Subway Station (Line 16) and only takes 10 minutes to walk. There are all kinds of restaurants near the store, which is very convenient; it is close to Renmin University and Beijing The University of Foreign Studies is within a 10-minute drive and the location is very convenient. The store is one of the few stores nearby that has its own parking lot. The store is free for hotel guests and has ample parking spaces.

commentList.translatedContent:
The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Suzhouqiao Subway Station. The facade is a bit simple and easy to miss on the road, but the service has many advantages.
1. Xiao Li, the service guy at the front desk, is enthusiastic and thoughtful, helping to verify orders, taking the initiative to make room cards (if he forgets to bring his room card, he makes one, and he takes the trouble to make several), and he also enthusiastically helps to microwave the guestsâ€™ meals in the restaurant. , give him 5 points of praise
2. The service of the small robot delivering to the room is very good
3. There is free freshly ground coffee in the hotel lobby, which is very welcoming.
4. The hotel provides 8 bottles of water every day, which is quite user-friendly in Beijing during the summer.
5. Recommend the superior twin room, the two 1.5m large beds are very comfortable
6. The breakfast is cleaner than expected, and the breakfast noodles are especially recommended. It would be better if there was bread and butter
7. The tea set and tea bags provided in the room are delicious. After a long day of playing, it is very relaxing to drink for a while.

When you upgrade to the Huazhu Club, you will get a free breakfast. We found out later that Xiao Li at the front desk enthusiastically reissued the application and refunded the extra breakfast fees paid several times before. Thank you!

Also in need of improvement are:
1. The public corridor in the room is relatively old, the carpet is a bit dark, and the ventilation generally has a smell.
2. There was a lot of dust on the clothes hangers when I checked in.
3. The handle of the sink switch will fall off
4. The hair dryer has poor contact and blows air intermittently.
5. The smart toilet is too sensitive and flushes automatically before it is finished (it is unhygienic to sit on it while flushing)

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for your review. Your satisfaction is the driving force for Xiaoji's progress. Xiaoji will continue to focus on guest needs and provide sincere services to demonstrate the high-quality services of Ji Hotel.

commentList.translatedContent:
The room facilities are very good, it feels clean and warm; the bathroom is separate, the space is sufficient, very convenient, and it has a smart toilet. The only drawback is that the room is tight. I only booked a windowless room. The room is not big and has no windows. There is no natural light. It is quiet and suitable for sleepingğŸ˜´
But overall it's pretty good and the kids like it very much.

feedbackList.translateContent: Xiao Ji is willing to devote everything to you, just to make you smile.

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is near Suzhou Bridge. It is very convenient to come to Wanliu for business and check-in. There are great Yunnan dishes and Japanese barbecue nearby, and parking is available in the backyard. The cleanliness of the Ji Hotel is always reassuring and trustworthy. The rooms also have windows. Although I live on the first floor, they are very quiet and I have a good rest. The reception at the hotel's front desk was warm and attentive, and the breakfast was upgraded. It was a great experience.

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest: Thank you very much for your affirmation of the store's service. The store is only 450 meters away from Suzhouqiao Subway Station (Line 16) and only takes 10 minutes to walk. There are all kinds of restaurants nearby the store, which is very convenient; it is also a short distance from Renmin University and Beijing The University of Foreign Studies is within a 10-minute drive and the location is very convenient. The store is one of the few stores nearby that has its own parking lot. The store is free for hotel guests and has ample parking spaces.

commentList.translatedContent: Simple and clean, check-in was fast and smooth. The only thing I want to complain about is the idea of â€‹â€‹handing out toothbrushes at the front desk. I support environmental protection and energy saving, but the process of getting a toothbrush at the front desk feels weird. Nothing wrong with anything else, very good.

feedbackList.translateContent: Thank you for your review despite your busy schedule. We will continue to work hard to provide better service and look forward to your next stay.

commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is very good. The environment is quiet. It is very close to the subway station and surrounding schools. There are also many good restaurants nearby. The hotel's health and service are also great. The staff are very good and the price is very cost-effective. I will come back next time. Choose this one.

It is very comfortable to live here in Beijing. The room is clean and the equipment is very new. The brothers and sisters at the front desk are very enthusiastic, the service is in place, and the transportation is relatively convenient. Next time I come to Beijing, I will still choose here

feedbackList.translateContent: Thank you for your recognition. All Seasons will continue to give back to customers with a warm and comfortable living environment and warm and thoughtful service. Welcome to come again.
